text: Ndithudi Ambuye wanu ndi Mulungu, amene mâ€™masiku asanu ndi limodzi adalenga kumwamba ndi dziko lapansi ndipo anabuka pamwamba pa Mpando wachifumu, nalamula zinthu zonse. Palibe wina amene adzalandira ulamuliro wopepesa kwa Mulungu pokhapokha atalandira chilolezo cha Mulungu. Ameneyo ndiye Mulungu Ambuye wanu, mpembedzeni Iye. Kodi simudzakumbukira
